headline: The AI Trade Is Back. This ETF Shows Why.
summary: The AI trade is back, if the GlobalX Artificial Intelligence & Technology exchange-trade fund is any indication.  The ETF has 85 component stocks, ranging from  Tencent Holdings  which comprises 3.9% of the fund, down to  Soundhound  AI, which makes up just 0.2%.

headline: William Blair Maintains a Neutral Rating on Palantir (PLTR) As DoD Awards Contract to OpenAI
summary: Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:PLTR) is one of the 12 Best Stocks to Buy and Hold for the Long Term. On June 16, William Blair analyst Louie DiPalma maintained a Hold rating on Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:PLTR) without a price target. The neutral rating is based on the recent contract awarded to OpenAI by the US Department […]

headline: In a Sea of AI Tools, Paraform Bets on People with $20M Series A from Felicis
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, June 24, 2025--Paraform, the hiring marketplace built for elite recruiters, today announced its $20 million in Series A funding led by Felicis, with participation from A*, BOND, DST Global, Liquid 2, and notable angels including the co-founders of Canva, Instacart, YouTube, and xAI along with Shyam Sankar, Harley Finklestein, Mark Pincus, and others. The raise follows revenue growth of 40x since Paraform’s 2024 seed round and brings the company’s total funding to $25 million.

raw.headline: In a Sea of AI Tools, Paraform Bets on People with $20M Series A from Felicis

The raise follows revenue growth of 40x since Paraform’s 2024 seed round and brings the company’s total funding to $25 million.

headline: Prediction: 3 Stocks That Will Be Worth More Than Palantir 3 Years From Now
summary: Palantir is valued among companies that are much larger than it.  Salesforce, ASML, and AMD will likely be larger than Palantir in the near future.  Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) is one of the most popular artificial intelligence (AI) stocks on the market, but it got that way by having a ton of hype baked into the stock.

headline: 3 Phenomenal AI Stocks That Investors Should Load Up On
summary: Nvidia's GPUs have built most of the AI technology we experience today.  Broadcom's connectivity switches and XPUs are slated to grow as inference becomes more common.  Artificial intelligence (AI) investing doesn't have to be hard.

headline: Which High-Flying Growth Stock Is Wall Street Most Bullish About: Palantir, Robinhood, or Spotify?
summary: Palantir is an AI powerhouse, but its sky-high valuation is hard to justify.  Robinhood is cashing in on crypto, but analysts seem to be conflicted about the stock's near-term prospects.  Wall Street is arguably most bullish about Spotify, but the consensus price target still reflects a moderate decline.

headline: Should You Buy These Beaten-Down AI Stocks?
summary: C3.ai is delivering strong growth, while the stock trades at a much lower valuation than Palantir.  BigBear.ai is providing national security solutions powered by AI with a promising backlog of demand.  The growth of artificial intelligence (AI) has the potential to create generational wealth for investors who buy and hold the right stocks.
